description: Ms. codex. Title from fol. 1a. Physical description: 18-24 lines per page, in 2 columns; written in naskhi in black ink on cream European glazed, laid paper. Catchwords and a few marginal notes. Some leaves repaired in inner margins; text unaffected. Some smudging of text, but still legible. Origin: Copy completed Rabīʻ al-Ākhir 1067 H. [January or February 1657] (fol. 6b). Incip.: الحمد لله العلي الصمد * الواحد الفرد الکرىم الاحد
author: Hādī ilá al-Ḥaqq, Yaḥyá ibn al-Ḥusayn, 859-910
abstract: Urjūzah on religious conduct and dogmatics. Notes and extracts on title page (fol. 1a).
extent: 6 leaves : paper ; 208 x 152 (162 x 97) mm. bound to 212 x 158 mm.

title.@value: الاداب الهادوية والحكم اليحيوية في الديانات والاصول وغيرها.
al-Ādāb al-Hādawīyah wa-al-ḥikam al-Yaḥyawīyah fī al-diyānāt wa-al-uṣūl wa-ghayrihā.

creator: Hādī ilá al-Ḥaqq, Yaḥyá ibn al-Ḥusayn, 859-910
هادي الى الحق، يحيى بن الحسين، 859-910
subject: Religious life—Zaydīyah—Early works to 1800
binding_note: Black cloth binding with stamped central diamond and fillets; orange endpapers.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
